name: Scoot 'n' Shoot
description:
CONTROLS:
P1:
W = FORWARDS
A = LEFT
S = BACKWARDS
D = RIGHT
Left Control = Shoot
P2:
Up Arrow Key = FORWARDS
Left Arrow Key = LEFT
Down Arrow Key = BACKWARDS
Right Arrow  Key = RIGHT
Right Control = Shoot

HOW TO PLAY:
Try and shoot the enemy space craft! 
If your health goes below 10, you lose!
Best experienced with a friend or sibling, though playing by yourself won't hurt.

HOW TO INSTALL:
Install the zip file
Unzip the folder
Open main.exe

NOTES FROM L4NQY:
No sound effects currently. (Are planned though!)
Plays in a small screen. 
Feel free to change the resolution with the code in the .py file. 
An icon will arrive for the .exe file eventually.
There will 

Any errors contact me on Discord. 'l4nqy#3594'

It's my first game in python that wasn't in console so I really appreciate you even trying it. <3
